author: Patti Domm
title: Fed bombards credit markets with limitless pledge, but investors barely respond
description: Market professionals see some thawing in credit markets, but investors still have a wait-and-see attitude about the virus and economic impact.
content:
The Federal Reserve blasted markets with a bigger and bolder stimulus package, but the response in credit markets has been tepid so far as stocks continue to sell off.
The Fed, ahead of Monday's market open, said it would launch a barrage of new programs to … [+4878 chars]
